alert.displayName: Cloud Controller and Diego in Sync
alert.description: Indicates if the cf-apps Domain is up-to-date, meaning that CF App requests from Cloud Controller are synchronized to bbs.LRPsDesired (Diego-desired AIs) for execution. For details, please check https://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-11/monitoring/kpi.html#cc-diego-sync

search.name: bbs.LRPsExtra.critical
search.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=LRPsExtra | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s | where AggregatedValue>=10

alert.description: Total number of LRP instances that are no longer desired but still have a BBS record. When Diego wants to add more apps, the BBS sends a request to the auctioneer to spin up additional LRPs. LRPsExtra is the total number of LRP instances that are no longer desired but still have a BBS record. For details, please check https://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-11/monitoring/kpi.html#LRPsExtra
